definition: to be afraid/to fear/to dread/to be unable to endure/perhaps

sentences.english: The part of the brain that is associated with tickling is the cerebellum.
sentences.chinese: 腦部與怕癢有關的部位是小腦。

sentences.english: Have you ever thought about why people are ticklish?
sentences.chinese: 你有沒有想過人爲什麼會怕癢？
